Text: .mkv file does not work with PS3.  Why not use .avi for this?

@Minty_Winty
If you had searched, you would have seen that eztv have uploaded another version to, in .avi, they always do

@marcus
Yeah I have the avi version, wanted the HD 720p copy though.

"The standard for HQ releases is using the H264 codec and the AVI file format doesn't support that"

 Errr, yes it does.  AVI can use the H264 codec, that is a FACT.

 I have encoded multiple videos in the past that have been AVIs with the H264 codec, Virtual dub can do it with no worries.

 Yes its not as good as an MP4 or an MKV but it does work, and a perfectly decent video can be made that way.
